hero.title: Invite the people who protect your heart
hero.description: Share a private dashboard with a parent, sibling, or trusted elder so they can review matches, verify safety steps, and celebrate milestones with you.

pillars.title: Liveness verified
pillars.description: Photo, video, and ID checks keep fake profiles away before a trusted friend ever reviews them.

pillars.title: Shared visibility
pillars.description: Trusted friends see curated snapshots—not private chats—so members keep agency while feeling supported.

pillars.title: Consent controls
pillars.description: Granular toggles let members pause access, hide sensitive fields, or escalate concerns instantly.

steps.title: Send a secure invite
steps.description: Add an email or WhatsApp number. We generate a one-time link that expires in 24 hours.

steps.title: Trusted friend reviews highlights
steps.description: They see verification status, match insights, and upcoming video dates—never private messages.

steps.title: Co-sign or raise a flag
steps.description: Trusted friends can endorse a connection, leave notes, or trigger an instant safety review.

trustSignals.title: Safeguards families asked for
items: SOC2-aligned audit trail with immutable activity logs
24/7 concierge trust desk for escalations across regions
Optional clergy or community elder access with limited scopes

items.question: Can trusted friends edit my profile?
items.answer: No. They only view safety status, matches you share, and notes you invite them to leave.

items.question: Is my chat history visible?
items.answer: Never. We only surface metadata (date scheduled, verification status) so your private conversations stay yours.

items.question: How many trusted friends can I add?
items.answer: Up to three at launch. You control access start/end dates and can revoke instantly.
